name: Register PVE Hookscript
description: Registers the oci-lxc-deployer hookscript on the Proxmox host. The hookscript runs on_start_container inside the container after each restart to start services that have no init system support.

parameters.name: Container ID
parameters.description: The ID of the LXC container to register the hookscript for

commands.description: Create/update hookscript and register with container
